channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游 23:15 The threat of shock UAVs The threat
item.description: 游 23:15 The threat of shock UAVs The threat This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
